com.github.protobufel.common.files.regex

Class RegexSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.protobufel.common.files.regex.RegexSupport

  • @NonNullByDefault
public final class RegexSupport
extends Object
    A utility class for use by ExtendedPattern and friends. Uses some portions of Matcher and ASCII needed mainly due to lack of access to Matcher.lastAppendPosition.
    Author:
    protobufel@gmail.com David Tesler
